title: Bob Iger to stay on as CEO of Walt Disney Company through 2026
description: The Walt Disney Company announced Bob Iger will remain its CEO through 2026.

title: Elon Musk unveils his new AI startup with a team of top researchers
description: Elon Musk is finally starting to talk about the artificial intelligence company he founded to compete with ChatGPT-maker OpenAI

title: WATCH:  Prepare for cuteness overload in the form of puppy yoga
description: Puppy yoga is the only kind of exercise we want to do from here on out!

title: Florida sinkhole that claimed a man's life in 2013 reopens, this time harmlessly
description: A Florida sinkhole that in 2013 fatally swallowed a man sleeping in his own house has reopened for a third time, this time behind chain-link fencing and doing no harm to people or property

title: Unaccompanied migrant girl from Guatemala dies in US custody, officials say
description: Officials say an unaccompanied 15-year-old migrant girl from Guatemala died from an underlying disease while in federal custody

title: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center facing federal probe over treatment of Black mothers
description: The federal government has launched a civil rights investigation into how Cedars-Sinai Medical Center treats Black women who give birth at the Los Angeles hospital.

title: Police: No crime committed by BBC presenter who allegedly paid teen for photos
description: London police say there's no evidence that a BBC presenter who allegedly paid a teenager for sexually explicit photos committed a crime

title: Three badly decomposing bodies found in remote Colorado campsite
description: Authorities say the badly decomposing bodies of three people have been found in a remote Rocky Mountains camp in Colorado, and that they may have been lying there since late last year

title: Powerball jackpot surges to $750 million for Wednesday drawing
description: A $750 million Powerball jackpot is up for grabs on Wednesday night.

title: Jailers face mounting questions after string of suspected murderers escape
description: The brazen escapes of three suspected murderers in recent days in separate incidents across the country are casting scrutiny on law enforcement, according to experts.

title: Biden to deliver key speech as high-stakes NATO summit comes to a close
description: Biden will speak on the strength of the alliance and the importance of continued support for Ukraine against Russian invaders, an administration official said.

title: Roadway bomb planted by drug cartel kills 3 police officers in Mexico, officials say
description: A coordinated series of roadway bomb blasts in western Mexico that officials say were a trap organized by a drug cartel has killed six police officers and prosecutors’ agents

title: WATCH:  Giant panda gives birth to twin cubs in South Korea
description: Plus, North Korea has conducted its first intercontinental ballistic missile test in three months.

title: 2 firefighters shot in potentially targeted attack, suspect at large
description: Two firefighters have been shot inside a Birmingham, Alabama, fire station in what police say may be a targeted attack.

title: WATCH:  Vultures strike perfect ‘spooky-cool’ pose
description: These turkey vultures gave an unexpectedly eerie dawn display in Flagstaff, Arizona.

title: WATCH:  Houses collapse after landslide in Los Angeles
description: Aerial footage shows the aftermath of a landslide which caused a row of houses to collapse in Los Angeles.

title: Police announce another arrest in Kansas nightclub shooting that injured more than 11
description: Police say they've arrested another person in a Kansas nightclub shooting earlier this month that injured nearly a dozen people

title: San Francisco's retail exodus goes beyond crime, experts say
description: Half of the stores in San Francisco's downtown hub have closed since 2019, one study showed.

title: Prosecutors rest sexual assault case against Kevin Spacey in London court
description: Prosecutors have rested their sexual assault case against Kevin Spacey in a London courtroom after four men testified against the two-time Oscar winner

title: Vandals in Naples destroy seminal artwork by 90-year-old Italian artist Pistoletto
description: Vandals have set fire and destroyed a seminal artwork by one of Italy’s most famous living artists

title: North Korea launches long-range missile into sea
description: North Korea test-fired an intercontinental ballistic missile that flew 621 miles toward Japan before falling in the water, South Korea said.

title: WATCH:  Robin Roberts, Lara Spencer tour London by bus
description: The “GMA” co-anchors take viewers to all the best spots of London as they see the city on a classic double-decker bus.

title: After Quran burnings, UN rights body calls for more action to combat religious hatred
description: The U.N.’s top human rights body overwhelmingly approved a measure calling on countries to do more to prevent religious hatred in the wake of Quran burnings in Europe over objections of Western countries who fear tougher steps by governments could tram...

title: WATCH:  Smile school teaches people how to rediscover their post-pandemic grins
description: This Tokyo smile school helps Japan’s residents work their facials back into shape after years of mask-wearing during the pandemic.

title: Bulgari apologizes to China for listing Taiwan as a country after online backlash
description: Italian luxury brand Bulgari is the latest international brand to apologize to China after listing Taiwan as a country on its website

title: Vermont grapples with historic flooding as more rainstorms head for Northeast
description: The Northeast was expected to get a break from the downpours before more rain is forecast to hit the region on Thursday.

title: 6-year-old escapes alleged kidnapper after biting his arm: Police
description: A 6-year-old girl in Florida thwarted her kidnapping outside her home after she bit the attacker, according to the Miami Police Department.

title: Inflation data expected to show significant slowdown of price increases
description: The inflation data arrives as the Federal Reserve weighs another rate hike.

title: Milan Kundera, Czech writer and former dissident, dies in Paris aged 94
description: Milan Kundera, whose dissident writings in communist Czechoslovakia transformed him into an exiled satirist of totalitarianism, has died in Paris at the age of 94, Czech media said Wednesday

title: Traces of explosives found on yacht in Nord Stream investigation, diplomats say
description: European diplomats have told the United Nations Security Council that investigators found traces of subsea explosives in samples taken from a yacht

title: China-based hackers breached European government email accounts, Microsoft says
description: A China-based hacking group has broken into email accounts linked to government agencies in Western Europe, Microsoft Corp. said this week

title: Iowa Legislature passes 6-week abortion ban, sending bill to governor's desk
description: The Iowa Legislature on Tuesday night passed a six-week abortion ban. It now heads to Gov. Kim Reynolds.

title: Scooter-riding gunman sought for attack that hurt 4 people at New York park
description: Police are hunting for a gunman who opened fire in a crowded New York park, wounding four people including two young children

title: North Korea launches ballistic missile toward sea day after making threat
description: South Korea says North Korea has launched a ballistic missile toward the North’s eastern waters

title: 26-year-old woman dies after falling 500 feet at Rocky Mountain National Park: NPS
description: A 26-year-old Boulder, Colorado, woman died after falling 500 feet while free-solo climbing a ridge at the Rocky Mountain National Park, park officials said.
